name: Night of the light (masterninjason)
description:
a casual game about exploring with a focus on light, and what you can see

controls:

WASD to move, SPACE to use your light, walk up to lanterns to light them, or refill your fuel if its already lit, collect chests and light lanterns and have fun or something

code: masterninjason

art: masterninjason, Rossdev, ImTheBoss

music/sfx: hamish
